title: Sales of streaming devices in the United States 2014
summary: This bar chart has 6 columns on the x axis representing Streaming Brand, and Unit sales in millions in each Streaming Brand on the y axis.
The Unit sales in millions is highest at Streaming Brand Apple TV and lowest at Streaming Brand Tivo.
The highest Streaming Brand Apple TV has 7.6 more Unit sales in millions than the lowest Streaming Brand Tivo.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Unit sales in millions for 6 number of Streaming Brands.
The Unit sales in millions is appeared to be the highest at Streaming Brand Apple TV and lowest at Streaming Brand Tivo.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 6 columns on the x axis representing Streaming Brand, and Unit sales in millions in each Streaming Brand on the y axis.
The Unit sales in millions is highest at Streaming Brand Apple TV and lowest at Streaming Brand Tivo.
The highest Streaming Brand Apple TV has 7.6 more Unit sales in millions than the lowest Streaming Brand Tivo.
max_summary: This bar chart has 6 columns on the x axis representing Streaming Brand, and Unit sales in millions in each Streaming Brand on the y axis.
The Unit sales in millions is appeared to be the highest at Streaming Brand Apple TV and lowest at Streaming Brand Tivo.
Second maximum Unit sales in millions is found at Streaming Brand Fire TV.
The highest Streaming Brand Apple TV has 7.6 more Unit sales in millions than the lowest Streaming Brand Tivo.
The Streaming Brand Apple TV has the highest Unit sales in millions, followed by Fire TV, and Roku. Down to the Streaming Brand Tivo which is the lowest.
The Streaming Brand Apple TV tends to be 1.91 percent higher than average.
The Unit sales in millions is 27.6 if we add up values of all Streaming Brands.
